MLflow and other ecosystem tools
MLflow is a tool that was created by the open source community to address a gap in open 
systems for ML systems, focused on reproducibility, model management, and deployment.
answer: MLflow is an open-source tool created for reproducibility, model management, and deployment in machine learning systems. It was developed by the open source community to address a gap in open systems for ML. MLflow is part of the ecosystem of tools available for machine learning tasks.
